import React, { useState } from 'react' import profile from '../Assets/profile.png' import phoneData from './contactData' const Contacts = () => { const [phoneList, setPhoneList] = useState(phoneData) const [showList, setList] = useState(phoneData[0]) const [name, setName] = useState('') const inputEvent = (e) => { const value = e.target.value setName(value) const searchContact = phoneList.filter(val => { return Object.values(val).join(' ').includes(name) }) setPhoneList(searchContact) } return (
    • { phoneList.map((val) => { return ( <>
  • setList(phoneData[val.id - 1])}>

    {val.first_name} {val.last_name}

    {val.phone}

    • ) }) }
) } export default Contacts
